Arnav Choudhry

Ph.D. Student
Carngeie Mellon University
arnav (at) cmu.edu

About

I am a second year PhD student at the Mobility Data Analytics Center (affiliated with the Civil Engineering and Machine Learning Departments), advised by Dr. Sean Qian. I am interested in using data to improve the built environment. Currently, I am working on improving energy efficiency of last-mile delivery.

I finished my undergrad (B.Tech.) in Civil Engineering (minor in Operations Research) from IIT Madras. Earlier, I have worked as a research intern at the Research Center for Advanced Science and Technology of the University of Tokyo under Dr. Hideki Koizumi, and also as a management consulting intern at PwC India.

Research Interests

  • Machine Learning: meta-learning, incremental learning, transfer learning
